article_title: De Blasio Signals Shift on Housing
article_text:
With three appointments to his housing team over the weekend, Mayor Bill de Blasio signaled a renewed focus on the city's sprawling public housing system.

Shola Olatoye, a vice president at Enterprise Community Partners Inc., was named to lead the New York City Housing Authority, the largest public housing agency in the country with some 2,600 buildings.

In naming Ms. Olatoye at the same time as the other key housing...
